Notes

Instruments used: ARP 2600 with St. Eric Mods (all tracks) ARP Odyssey with St. Eric Mods (bass on 2,3,5,6,8, lead on 5,8,11) Roland Jupiter 4 with IO MIDI Kit (3,5,6,8,11) Roland SH5 (bass on 11) Roland TR 808 (4,6,7) MFB Schlagzwerg (7) Boss DR55 (1,2,6) Linndrum Mk2 with Ebayed Eproms (6,7) Hohner Clavinet D6 (2,3,8) Yamaha Piano (2,4,7,8,11) Eminent Grand Theatre Piano (strings and drums on 11) U-HE Diva (5,6,7) NI Abbey Road Drums 60s/70s (1,2,3,5,8,11) NI Harpsichord (2) Los Angeles Scoring Strings VST (2,3) My Brother's Double Bass (8) Martin Guitar (2,8) Fender Tacocaster (6) Trumpet Simba (1) Adams Vibraphone (2) All songs published by Sony/ATV Music Publishing Scandinavia except Svensk Sås, copyright control and Johnny and Mary, published by Warner/Chapel Music Publishing. Bryan Ferry appears courtesy of BMG Rights Management (UK) LTD. Svensk Sås originally performed by Monica Törnell. Thanks for helping out: Mattis, Bendik, Thomas, Hans-Peter, Jørn, André, Gerd, Phillip, Mari & Alf, friends and family. ©&℗ 2014 Olsen Records Distributed and manufactured by AWAL/Kobalt Label Services 2x12" + insert + MP3 320/WAV download code Track 9 & 10 is only referred to as "Swing Star" on the rear tracklist and is the same track Some tracks on the vinyl release appear as shortened edited-versions (Delorean Dynamite, Johnny and Mary, Swing Star).
